Talking about samplot at 2019 Rocky Mountain Genomics HackCon at CU Boulder

Jun 21, 2019

The 2019 Rocky Mountain Genomics HackCon had a great line up, including:

  • Maria Nattestad (Google)
  • Deanna Church (Inscripta)
  • Sanjida Rangwala (NCBI)
  • Danielle Szafir (Information Science, CU Boulder)
  • Dan Larremore (BioFrontiers Institute and Computer Science, CU Boulder)

I was also fortunate enough to get a chance to talk about samplot and SV-plaudit.

Here is a recording of that talk:
